tree.name: Derrick White
tree.tradeDescription: Celtics acquire White for Richardson, Langford, 2022 1st (protected 1-4), 2028 swap

assetsGivenUp.name: Josh Richardson
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Celtics acquire Richardson for Moses Brown

assetsGivenUp.name: Moses Brown
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Part of Kemba Walker trade. Celtics sent Walker, 2021 #16 pick, 2025 2nd. Received Horford, Brown, 2025 2nd

assetsGivenUp.name: Kemba Walker
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Signed 4yr/$141M max contract as unrestricted free agent from Charlotte
assetsGivenUp.note: Free agent signing - TRUE ORIGIN. No assets exchanged.

assetsGivenUp.name: 2021 1st Round Pick (#16)
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Celtics own pick from 2020-21 season (36-36 record)

assetsGivenUp.name: Romeo Langford
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Drafted with pick acquired from SAC (via PHI in Fultz trade)

assetsGivenUp.name: 2019 1st Round Pick (#14, from SAC)
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Part of Fultz trade. Celtics traded #1 pick for #3 pick (Tatum) and future SAC 1st

assetsGivenUp.name: 2017 #1 Overall Pick (from BKN)
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: The Nets trade: KG, Pierce, Terry for unprotected picks
assetsGivenUp.note: Same origin as Jayson Tatum - see Tatum tree for full Nets trade breakdown

assetsGivenUp.name: Paul Pierce
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Drafted by Celtics with their OWN pick

assetsGivenUp.name: Kevin Garnett
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: See Tatum tree for full KG trade breakdown
assetsGivenUp.note: Links to Al Jefferson (2004 own pick) - TRUE ORIGIN

assetsGivenUp.name: Jason Terry
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Signed as free agent from Dallas

assetsGivenUp.name: 2022 1st Round Pick (protected 1-4)
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Celtics own pick - conveyed as #53 due to protection
